name: The Golf Club 2019 Featuring the PGA TOUR.
name_original: The Golf Club 2019 Featuring the PGA TOUR.
description:
Do you have what it takes to win the FedExCup on the PGA TOUR? Compete in the all new officially licensed PGA TOUR Career mode. Play on famous courses like TPC Boston, TPC Sawgrass and more. Show off your skills as you take part in PGA TOUR events such as the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open, the John Deere Classic and the Waste Management Phoenix Open. Take on Career Rivals throughout the season for that extra challenge and promise of reward. 

 The Golf Club 2019 Featuring the PGA TOUR is an exciting sequel in The Golf Club franchise and comes with a whole host of new and improved content and features across all aspects of the game, from a restructured Career mode experience to sponsors who challenge you and set you goals for a chance to earn rewards from licensed brands like Under Armour. Look out for an expanded character editor, new and improved online and solo societies, new game modes such as Skins and ALT-SHOT, a refined online match-making system for an enhanced multiplayer experience as well as much, much more! 

 Find out more here at: http://www.thegolfclub2019.com/
